root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 3-1-1, translated into en
root.data:
Treatment of missing values:

  • At country level:
  • At regional and global levels:

To inform projection of trends across periods where data are sparse, or for countries with little or no data at all, the BMaT statistical model is used to estimate maternal mortality. The model includes factors known to be associated with maternal mortality as predictor covariates (GDP, GFR and SAB).
